definitions.definition: A colourless non - aged alcoholic liquor made by distilling fermented grains such as barley , corn , oats or rye with juniper berries ; the base for many cocktails .
( poker ) Drawing the best card or combination of cards.
examples: Johnny Chan held jack-nine, and hit gin when a queen-ten-eight board was dealt out.

main_definition: A colourless non - aged alcoholic liquor made by distilling fermented grains such as barley , corn , oats or rye with juniper berries ; the base for many cocktails .
secondary_definitions: ( poker ) Drawing the best card or combination of cards.

definitions.definition: ( obsolete ) A trick ; a device or instrument .
( obsolete ) A scheme ; contrivance ; artifice ; a figurative trap or snare .
A snare or trap for game .
A machine for raising or moving heavy objects , consisting of a tripod formed of poles united at the top, with a windlass , pulleys , ropes, etc.
( mining ) A hoisting drum , usually vertical ; a whim .
An instrument of torture worked with screws .

definitions.label_groups: Australia , now considered offensive , ethnic slur

main_definition: ( Australia , now considered offensive , ethnic slur ) An Aboriginal woman .
